Package com.team1.Auber

Class Systems

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
      • com.team1.Auber.Systems
  • public class Systems
extends com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
    Create and maneges the systems that the players and operatives use. This extends Actor purely so that it can use the draw function as its called every frame.
    Author:
    Adam Wiegand (Team 4), Robert Watts (Team 4), Bogdan Bodnariu-Lescinschi (Team 4), Harry Smith (Team 1)

    • Constructor Detail

      • Systems

        public Systems​(int x,
               int y,
               int w,
               int h,
               MapRenderer map,
               HUD hud,
               java.lang.String roomName,
               int healthMax)
        Create the system
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the system on the TMX map
        y - The Y coordinate of the system on the TMX map
        w - The width of the system on the TMX map
        h - The height of the the system on the TMX map
        map - the map
        hud - the headsup display
        roomName - the name of the room the system is in
        healthMax - the maximum health value

        map - the map
        hud - the headsup display
